1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Harith bin Nawfal said:"I asked whether the Messenger of Allah prayed voluntary prayer when traveling, but I could not find anyone to tell me until Umm Hani' bint Abu Talib told me that he had come during the year of the Conquest (of Makkah). He ordered that a screen be held up, and that was done, and he took a bath; then he prayed eight Rak'ah (units) of voluntary prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِتَارِ عِنْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about being concealed when bathing
